花魁道中: (おいらんどうちゅう) - (yoji) procession of courtesans
花鮫: (ハナザメ) - spinner shark (Carcharhinus brevipinna); long-nose grey shark
花鳥画: (かちょうが) - painting of flowers and birds; bird-and-flower genre in Chinese and Japanese painting
花鳥諷詠: (かちょうふうえい) - (yoji)  the beauties of nature as the key poetic theme; the central theme in composing poetry (haiku) must be the beauties of nature and the harmony that exist between nature and man. (The slogan of the Hototogisu School of modern Japanese haiku)
花鳥風月: (かちょうふうげつ) - (yoji)  beauties of nature/the traditional themes of natural beauty in Japanese aesthetics; artistic pursuits involving nature themes
芳しい: (kanbashii) - sweet, fragrant, aromatic; good (por exemplo, reputação, rumor), favorable
芳しくない: (かんばしくない) - poor; unfavourable; unfavorable; disgraceful
芳しく無い: (かんばしくない) - poor; unfavourable; unfavorable; disgraceful
芳信: (ほうしん) - honorific reference to another's letter; tidings of peach blossoms
芳名: (ほうめい) - good name; good reputation; your name
芳名帳: (ほうめいちょう) - visitors' book; guest book
芳墨: (ほうぼく) - scented ink; honorific reference to another's letter
芳心: (ほうしん) - honorific reference to another's kind intentions
芳恩: (ほうおん) - favour; favor; kindness; obligation; debt of gratitude
芳情: (ほうじょう) - your good wishes; your kind intentions
芳書: (ほうしょ) - honorific reference to another's letter
芳樹: (ほうじゅ) - beautiful tree; tree producing beautiful flowers
芳潤: (ほうじゅん) - mellow (flavor or fragrance, esp. alcohol); rich; full-bodied; superior
芳烈: (ほうれつ) - aromatic; heroic deed; outstanding achievement
芳眉: (ほうび) - eyebrows of a beautiful woman
芳紀: (ほうき) - age of a young lady who is at the peak of her (sexual) attractiveness; marriable age (of a young lady); sweet sixteen
芳縁: (ほうえん) - good fate; auspicious fate
芳醇: (houjun) - mellow (sabor ou fragrância, especialmente álcool), rich, full-bodied, superior
芳韻: (ほういん) - Chinese poem; poem; rhyme
芳香: (houkou) - perfume, fragrância, aroma, bálsamo, cheiro doce
芳香を放つ: (ほうこうをはなつ) - to give out (off) fragrance
芳香族アミン: (ほうこうぞくアミン) - aromatic amine

芳香族炭化水素: (ほうこうぞくたんかすいそ) - aromatic hydrocarbon
芳香油: (ほうこうゆ) - fragrant oil; essential oil
芸: (gei) - arte, arte, ofício, realização, habilidade artística, técnica, apresentação
芸がない: (げいがない) - lacking skill; uninspiring; unexciting; dull; unrefined; boring (from being too plain)
芸が無い: (げいがない) - lacking skill; uninspiring; unexciting; dull; unrefined; boring (from being too plain)
芸なし: (げいなし) - unaccomplished person; uninteresting person; nobody
芸なし猿: (げいなしざる) - useless person; good-for-nothing
芸のない: (げいのない) - uninspiring; unexciting; dull; unrefined; uninteresting
芸の虫: (げいのむし) - devotee of the arts
芸は身を助く: (げいはみをたすく) - Art brings bread
芸をする犬: (げいをするいぬ) - dog that knows (does) tricks
芸事: (げいごと) - traditional performing arts (e.g. shamisen, koto, dance, etc.); accomplishments
芸人: (geinin) - entertainer (especialmente em uma arte tradicional), performer, artiste; talented person, accomplished person
芸備線: (げいびせん) - Geibi Line (Hiroshima-North Okayama Railway)
芸大: (げいだい) - university of arts; arts college
芸娼妓: (げいしょうぎ) - geisha and prostitutes
芸娼妓解放令: (げいしょうぎかいほうれい) - ordinance liberating all geisha and prostitutes
芸子: (げいこ) - geisha; kabuki actor (esp. a young actor); someone accomplished in the arts
芸当: (げいとう) - feat; risky attempt; trick; stunt
芸林: (げいりん) - artistic and literary circles
芸歴: (げいれき) - one's history as a performer
芸無し: (げいなし) - unaccomplished person; uninteresting person; nobody
芸無し猿: (げいなしざる) - useless person; good-for-nothing
芸者: (げいしゃ) - geisha; Japanese singing and dancing girl
芸者を上げる: (げいしゃをあげる) - to call in a geisha
芸能: (げいのう) - public entertainment; accomplishments; attainments
芸能人: (げいのうじん) - performer; entertainer; celebrity
芸能界: (げいのうかい) - world of show business
芸苑: (げいえん) - artistic and literary circles
芸術は長く人生は短し: (げいじゅつはながくじんせいはみじかし) - Art is long, life is short

芸術愛好家: (げいじゅつあいこうか) - art lover; lover of the arts
